title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog that appears does not have a default folder selected. It would be helpful if the Import Project feature could remember the last folder I've imported a project from.
OB: Currently, when I try to import a project, the dialog does not have a default folder selected. I have to manually navigate to the desired folder every time I want to import a project.
EB: It would be nice if the Import Project feature could remember the last folder I've imported a project from and automatically select it as the default folder in the dialog.
